short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance Your WhatsApp Conversations with WA Send Plus!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing WasendPlus, the ultimate WhatsApp Chrome extension that revolutionizes your messaging experience with powerful features and enhanced privacy. 🚀

What sets WasendPlus apart: 🌟
‣ Chatgpt powered Reply suggestions
‣ Automatically sorted tabs under Unread, Groups labels.
‣ Create your own labels and add chats to them.
‣ Send a message without saving the number on your phone. 
‣ Save quick replies with attachments to send them when needed.
‣ Set follow-ups with notes, email ids, amount, to remind you - in every chat.
‣ See your reminders and notifications sorted by date to plan your day.

Experience efficiency like never before with automatically sorted tabs under Unread and Groups labels, along with the ability to create custom labels for organized chats. Send messages without saving numbers on your phone, save quick replies with attachments, and set follow-ups with notes, email IDs, and amounts to keep track of important conversations. 📝💼

Stay on top of your schedule with reminders and notifications sorted by date, helping you plan your day effectively. Unlike other WhatsApp Chrome extensions, WasendPlus strictly adheres to WhatsApp's terms of use, ensuring a secure and compliant messaging environment. 🔒

Elevate your WhatsApp Web experience today. Have any queries or feedback? Reach out to us at wasenderplus@gmail.com. 📧

Trust WasendPlus to be your featured extension for unparalleled productivity and privacy. 🏆
